definition: to avoid suffering/to prevent (sth bad)/to protect against (damage)/immunity (from prosecution)/freedom (from pain, damage etc)/exempt from punishment
to excuse sb/to exempt/to remove or dismiss from office/to avoid/to avert/to escape/to be prohibited
to receive/to accept/to suffer/subjected to/to bear/to stand/pleasant/(passive marker)

sentences.english: These plants must be sheltered from direct sunlight.
sentences.chinese: 這種植物必須遮起來，免受陽光直射。

sentences.english: These vaccines protect you from getting infected with mumps.
sentences.chinese: 這些疫苗能夠保護你免受腮腺炎感染。

sentences.english: They built the Great Wall to protect the country from being attacked.
sentences.chinese: 他們修建了長城，以保護國家免受攻擊。

sentences.english: To avoid misusage of your phone, please take safety measure, such as.
sentences.chinese: 爲了使您的手機免受誤用，請採取防範措施，如。

sentences.english: The Mandans protected themselves against the disaster of crop failure and accompanying hunger.
sentences.chinese: 曼丹人保護自己免受作物歉收以及由此引發的飢餓。

sentences.english: The silk floss padding can prevent the soy paste from contamination.
sentences.chinese: 絲棉就可以讓裏面的醬料免受外界的污染了。

sentences.english: Windbreaks not only protect land and crops from the wind.
sentences.chinese: 防風林不僅可以保護土地和農作物免受風災。

sentences.english: It has been proved that NGB could protect the neuron from hypoxic injury.
sentences.chinese: 已有研究表明腦紅蛋白能夠保護神經元免受缺氧損傷。

sentences.english: The programme had asked whether American beef was free from mad-cow disease.
sentences.chinese: 該節目曾經詢問美國牛肉是否免受瘋牛病影響。

sentences.english: It frees you from the burden of shaded truths and the oppression they bring.
sentences.chinese: 它使你免受隱瞞真相的負擔及其帶來的壓力。

sentences.english: 268:The villagers were planting trees to protect the crops from the strong wind.
sentences.chinese: 爲保護莊稼免受強風侵害，村民在植樹。

sentences.english: Chinais incapable of, and does not wish to protect itself from nuclear blackmail.
sentences.chinese: 中國無力，同時也不希望保護自己免受核訛詐。

sentences.english: Many are built on stilts to keep them above any future high water.
sentences.chinese: 許多房屋都配有腳柱使它們免受未來水害的侵擾。

sentences.english: The princess kept Rajah safe from harm.
sentences.chinese: 公主總是讓讓佳免受傷害。

sentences.english: An effective antioxidant, vitamin C helps to protect cells against free radical damage.
sentences.chinese: 抗氧化劑，保護細胞免受遊離基破壞。

sentences.english: To avoid misusage of your phone , please take safety measure, such as.
sentences.chinese: 爲使您的手機免受誤用，請採取防範措施，如。

definition: to avoid suffering/to avoid meeting (a fatal accident)/spared
to be saved from/to be spared (something)
to prevent/to guard against/to take precautions
to avert/to prevent/to avoid/to refrain from
to make/to cause/to enable/to use/to employ/to send/to instruct sb to do sth/envoy/messenger
to save from damage/to preserve/to maintain/to keep in good repair/(Tw) security guard
